name: Gorilla Tag
summary: Run, climb, and jump with other gorillas using the original, iconic locomotion method that only needs the movement of your hands and arms. No buttons, no sticks, no teleportation. Push off surfaces to jump and squeeze them with both hands to climb. With over 12 million players, Gorilla Tag is still the #1 most popular game in VR—and the best place to find other monke to play with.
